unnormalised: Borem, tum differential calculus somzun gheunk sodta, mhunn tika? Chinta korunk zai na, tem dista titlem bhirankull nhoi, pustokam bhirantichem distalem tori astolem! Oxem dharun ghe: tum tuji scooty choloytat, mhunnge Honda Activa 6G, ani tumkam ekdamuch brake marunk poddtta. Differential calculus amkam hea vixayant somzunk modot korta ki tum kitlem vegin ani ek kshannan kashin slow kortat.
normalised: Borem, tor tumi differential calculus somzun ghetanaat, borem? Chinta korunk naka, tem aikunk bhenkro disona, poryant pustokam trasdaayak distat! Tem ashem chintun: tumi tumchi scooty choloytat, koxachi tori Honda Activa six G, ani uchit torancher brak marunk zai. Differential calculus ami ek kshanant kitlem rokhddench komi zata tem somzunk modot korta.

unnormalised: Tachi buniyad differential calculus bodlachi gat sodta. Tumchi physics class ugddas asa? Velocity mhunnge position bodolpachi gat samayakantlean. Buniyadi formula tumkam ugddas yetalem mhunnge distance/time = speed. Punn speed-uch bodolta zalear? Tithem moja suru zata. Tika chintun poya: tum 0 kmph-antlean 60 kmph-ant, mhunnge 10 second-ant zata.
normalised: Tachi mukhya vostu mhunnje, differential calculus bodlopache darancher laksh kendrit korta. Tumchea physics class-achem tumka yaad asa? Velocity mhunnje fakt velache sandrbhat position-ache bodlapache dar asa. Tumka ek sadem formula yaad astolem tem mhunnje distance bhagile time barabor speed. Punn speeduch bodolta zalear? Thoim mazza suru zata. Tacho vichar korat: tumi zero kilometer por hour-an thavn saxti kilometer por hour-an, dharun dha second-an bhov vegaan choloytat.

unnormalised: Ammi "derivative" vaprun he tatkalin bodlachi gat sodtanv. Ti ek point-acher curve-achi slope sodta. Ek graph kallpna kor zantunt x-axis samayak (seconds-ant) asa ani y-axis distance (meters-ant). Tum ek line kaddtat ji curve-ak ek khas point-acher touch zata (a tangent), tea line-achi slope tea point-acher derivative asa. Dharun geya t=2 seconds-ar tumchem derivative 5 m/s asa. Tech kshannan tumchi velocity 5 m/s asa mhunn dista.
normalised: Ami "derivative" vapurtan he tatkalik bodlapache dar shodunk. Tem eka tharavik sthanacher curve-achi slope shodun kaddpak sarkhem asta. Eka graph-achi kalpna korat jithe x-axis time asa (seconds-an) ani y-axis distance asa (meters-an). Zonn ek rekha kuddkyak lagun curve-ak ek tharavik sthanacher (ek tangent), tea rekhechi slope tea sthanacher derivative asta. Dharun t barabor don second, tumchi derivative panch meter por second asa. Tech mhunnje tea tatkalik kshanan, tumchi velocity panch meter por second asa.

unnormalised: Atam, ammi kainch praktikal vaprap vixayant uloya, khas korun Bharata-ant relevant asa. Tum ek pul design kortat mhunn dharun geya, mhunnge Mumbai-antle Bandra-Worli Sea Link. Differential calculus engineers-ak pul-achi curve optimize korunk modot korta tankam tan minimiz korunk zata ani sthirata-chi khatri korunk zata. Va, ek Tata Nexon car-chi fuel efficiency optimize korunk chintun poya.
normalised: Atam, ami kainch vyavharik upyoganche vishayan uloya, khas korun Bharataant relevant. Dharun tumi eka pulachi designing kortat, mhunntat Mumbai-cho Bandra-Worli Sea Link. Differential calculus engineer-ank pulache curve-ak vaittani komi korunk ani sthirta rakhunk modot korta. Vo, Tata Nexon car-achi fuel efficiency sudharopachem chintun pollunkaat.

unnormalised: Businesses calculus vapurtat. Reliance Jio-chi company aaple data plans-ache bore dam sodunk chintun poya. Tankam differential calculus vaprunk zata demand curve model korunk ani ek dam sodunk zata zantunt tankam labh zata. Dharun geya tankam Rs. 10-an dam vaddoyli zalear, demand 5%-an khalla vota. Borem zage sodunk zai.
normalised: Vyapar udhyog nehmich calculus vapurtat! Reliance Jio sarkhi company aplea data plans-acheak uttam kim'mat nakki korunk prayatn karta, ashi kalpna korat. Te demand curve-ache model korunk ani profit vaddoitat tea kim'matichem sthan shodunk differential calculus vapru yeta. Dharun tankam kim'mat dha rupiya vaddoyleo zalear, demand panch percent-an unnem zanvye. Uttam sthan sodun kaddop mukhya asa.

unnormalised: Zor formulas-ant poddun naka votuya. Buniyadi vixayan suru kor ani kitem ghoddta tem disun taka poya. Khan Academy ani online resources heak bore zavn asa. Tumkam sine ani cosine graphs trigonometry-antlean ugddas asa? Tum differentiate suru kelear ti khup moja dita! Sin(x) differentiate korunk prayatna kor; tumkam cos(x) melltolem! Ek borem pattern, kite naso?
normalised: Khomkhale formula-n atanch bhartun vonchona. Moolbhoot vicharank suruvaat korat ani kainch ghodtta tem dollean pollunk prayatn korat. Khan Academy ani her online resources kiteak-i bare asat. Trigonometry thavn tim sine ani cosine graphs yaad asa? Te khorench aanonddayok zata zati tancher differentiation korunk suru kortoch! X-achem sine differentiate korunk prayatn korat; tumkam x-achem cosine melltolem! Ek chhan pattern, mhunnona?

unnormalised: Calculus physics ani engineering-ache bhair khup fields-ant vapurta. Economists-am vazar-ache trend model kortat, biologists population growth study kortat (mhunnge, Bandipur National Park-antle tigers-anche growth rate-chi counting kortat), ani computer scientists machine learning algorithms-ant vapurtat. Monsoon-ache patterns-anche vixayant chintun poya tancho impact vegetable-ache dam ani milavale vixayant poddta, mhunnge tomatoes Rs. 20/kg-antlean Rs. 100/kg-ant vota.
normalised: Calculus khub shetramni vapurtat fakt physics ani engineering-ak choddttoch. Arthashastri bazaar trends-ache model korunk vapurtat, jeevashastri lokanche vaddichem study korunk vapurtat (udharanarth, Bandipur National Park-an vaaghache vaddichem dar ganun kaddunk), ani computer shastri machine learning algorithms-an vapurtat. Monsoon pattern sarke karonnachea prabhaavacho vichar korat je tomattiche kim'mat ani upalabdhacher prabhaav karta jenna tee rupiya vis por kilogram-an thavn rupiya ek sho por kilogram-ak zata.

unnormalised: Devn, tum Delhi-Gurgaon Expressway-ar traffic-ant asat va Chennai-antle Marina Beach-ar sunset-achi maja gheytat, differential calculus tumchea chovtha bhag bhonvti asta, sonvsar choloytaleak modot korta. Challenge-ak aapnava, niyall-am practice kor, ani tum kitlem vegin ukhlun gheta tumak ashcharya zata! Tum Srinivasa Ramanujan zatole!
normalised: Taka lagun, punhvelli tumi Delhi-Gurgaon Expressway-acher traffic-ant aspaddlolea vo Chennai-cher Marina Beach-acher surya astachem mazza ghetlea mhunnlear, differential calculus tumchea bhovo-bhovotin asa hem yaad dovrat, je jagak vaur korunk modot korta. Avahanak aalingan divat, nemane praktik korat, ani kitlem rokhddench tumi tem shikonk pavteleat ten tumkam zaskurt kel'lean tonch kolltolem! Tumchi pudaachi Srinivasa Ramanujan zateli!
